text:
The Apache documentation should contain a small section to point users and 
developers to relevant RFC's. While veteran user know where to look for them, 
new and unexperienced users usually don't.
creator: info@orangexl.com

text:
There's already the project library <http://httpd.apache.org/library/>.

But, yes, a better list with some explanations was also in my mind for a time...
-> put on Todo.

Thanks.
creator: nd@perlig.de
jsl@apache.org
text:
I've begun working on this -- it should surface soon at
http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.1/misc/relevant_standards.html, and is a work in
progress.
Jasons docs are now online so I'm closing this one.
creator: erik@codefaktor.de
